ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( Opportunity__r.Data_Error_Fixed__c = true, OR( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "UnProcessed"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Sent for Approval"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Cancelled"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Booking Blocked") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: SO not allowed for Booking where the status is no yet approved.
